Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, west of the Ivanhouse Arena.
Room.LongDescription: Occasionally, you can hear shouts of victory or defeat coming from inside the stone walls of the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility, where people are challenged to take on gladiators literally one-on-one, without the assistance of other people. On the west side of the road, you can see the Oceancrest Central Recycling Plant and Reclaimation Center, where all the trash in Oceancrest is processed.
